---
id: get-latest-committee
title: "Latest committee"
description: "Retrieves the latest committee from the Aleo blockchain.  The committee represents the Validator set at this given point in time."

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/committee/latest"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the latest committee from the Aleo blockchain.  The committee represents the Validator set at this given point in time.


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
